thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.ca
thread.title: Michael Parry

author: Michael Parry
title: Michael Parry
text:
My experience with Flashbay & Samantha was excellent.
Samantha provided multiple Quote: s for different products along with several virtual proofs. She also sent me two separate shipments of samples which ultimately helped us decide which USB drive to go with.
After we made our final decision, the time to process and receive the product was very quick.
And the drives we received are exactly what we wanted and look amazing.
Thank you again for all of the help.
